errors.error_description: The README presents a usage example at the very beginning, before any context or installation instructions, which is a logical order error.
correction_candidates: Move the 'Usage Example' section to after the main description and the link to the installation documentation.
Delete the 'Usage Example' section and refer users to the official documentation for examples.
Add a note at the beginning of the 'Usage Example' section: 'Please install the package first by following the instructions below.'
Add the installation command `pip install photutils` directly inside the 'Usage Example' section.
errors.golden_answer: Delete the 'Usage Example' section and refer users to the official documentation for examples.
